citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05pm-12:35pm
on 8/4/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking at door of the facility and the facility stated that
no responsible adult was available for the inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05pm-12:35pm 
on 8/4/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking at door of the facility and the facility stated that 
no responsible adult was available for the inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
